Body:
options = {'input_dir_path': self.input_dir, 'magfile':
    'ldeo_magic_example.dat'}
options['noave'] = 1
options['specnum'] = 2
options['samp_con'] = 2
options['meas_file'] = 'custom_measurements.txt'
options['location'] = 'new place'
options['labfield'], options['phi'], options['theta'] = 40, 0, 90
program_ran, outfile = convert.ldeo(**options)
self.assertTrue(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(os.path.realpath(options['meas_file']), os.path.realpath(
    outfile))
